verses.verse: Now it came to pass in the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%>, that <S%H3458>Ishmael<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5418>Nethaniah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H476>Elishama<s%>, of the <S%H2233>seed<s%> <S%H4410>royal<s%>, and the <S%H7227>princes<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%>, even <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> with him, <S%H935>came<s%> unto <S%H1436>Gedaliah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H296>Ahikam<s%> to <S%H4709>Mizpah<s%>; and there they did <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%> in <S%H4708>Mizpah<s%>.

Then <S%H6965>arose<s%> <S%H3458>Ishmael<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5418>Nethaniah<s%>, and the <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> that were with him, and <S%H5221>smote<s%> <S%H1436>Gedaliah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H296>Ahikam<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8227>Shaphan<s%> with the <S%H2719>sword<s%>, and <S%H4191>slew<s%> him, whom the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> had made <S%H6485>governor<s%> over the <S%H776>land<s%>.

<S%H3458>Ishmael<s%> also <S%H5221>slew<s%> all the <S%H3064>Jews<s%> that were with him, even with <S%H1436>Gedaliah<s%>, at <S%H4709>Mizpah<s%>, and the <S%H3778>Chaldeans<s%> that were <S%H4672>found<s%> there, and the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H4421>war<s%>.
And it came to pass the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> after he had <S%H4191>slain<s%> <S%H1436>Gedaliah<s%>, and no <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H3045>knew<s%> it,

That there <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H582>certain<s%> from <S%H7927>Shechem<s%>, from <S%H7887>Shiloh<s%>, and from <S%H8111>Samaria<s%>, even <S%H8084>fourscore<s%> <S%H376>men<s%>, having their <S%H2206>beards<s%> <S%H1548>shaven<s%>, and their <S%H899>clothes<s%> <S%H7167>rent<s%>, and having <S%H1413>cut<s%> themselves, with <S%H4503>offerings<s%> and <S%H3828>incense<s%> in their <S%H3027>hand<s%>, to <S%H935>bring<s%> them to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

And <S%H3458>Ishmael<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5418>Nethaniah<s%> went <S%H3318>forth<s%> from <S%H4709>Mizpah<s%> to <S%H7125>meet<s%> them, <S%H1058>weeping<s%> all <S%H1980>along<s%> as he <S%H1980>went<s%>: and it came to pass, as he <S%H6298>met<s%> them, he <S%H559>said<s%> unto them, <S%H935>Come<s%> to <S%H1436>Gedaliah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H296>Ahikam<s%>.

And it was so, when they <S%H935>came<s%> into the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%>, that <S%H3458>Ishmael<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5418>Nethaniah<s%> <S%H7819>slew<s%> them, and cast them into the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H953>pit<s%>, he, and the <S%H582>men<s%> that were with him.

But <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> were <S%H4672>found<s%> among them that <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H3458>Ishmael<s%>, <S%H4191>Slay<s%> us not: for we <S%H3426>have<s%> <S%H4301>treasures<s%> in the <S%H7704>field<s%>, of <S%H2406>wheat<s%>, and of <S%H8184>barley<s%>, and of <S%H8081>oil<s%>, and of <S%H1706>honey<s%>. So he <S%H2308>forbare<s%>, and <S%H4191>slew<s%> them not <S%H8432>among<s%> their <S%H251>brethren<s%>.

Now the <S%H953>pit<s%> wherein <S%H3458>Ishmael<s%> had <S%H7993>cast<s%> all the dead <S%H6297>bodies<s%> of the <S%H582>men<s%>, whom he had <S%H5221>slain<s%> <S%H3027>because<s%> of <S%H1436>Gedaliah<s%>, was it which <S%H609>Asa<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> had <S%H6213>made<s%> for <S%H6440>fear<s%> of <S%H1201>Baasha<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: and <S%H3458>Ishmael<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5418>Nethaniah<s%> <S%H4390>filled<s%> it with them that were <S%H2491>slain<s%>.

Then <S%H3458>Ishmael<s%> carried away <S%H7617>captive<s%> all the <S%H7611>residue<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> that were in <S%H4709>Mizpah<s%>, even the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H1323>daughters<s%>, and all the <S%H5971>people<s%> that <S%H7604>remained<s%> in <S%H4709>Mizpah<s%>, whom <S%H5018>Nebuzar-adan<s%> the <S%H7227>captain<s%> of the <S%H2876>guard<s%> had <S%H6485>committed<s%> to <S%H1436>Gedaliah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H296>Ahikam<s%>: and <S%H3458>Ishmael<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5418>Nethaniah<s%> carried them away <S%H7617>captive<s%>, and <S%H3212>departed<s%> to go <S%H5674>over<s%> to the <S%H1121%H5983>Ammonites<s%>.

Now it came to pass, that when all the <S%H5971>people<s%> which were with <S%H3458>Ishmael<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H3110>Johanan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7143>Kareah<s%>, and all the <S%H8269>captains<s%> of the <S%H2428>forces<s%> that were with him, then they were <S%H8055>glad<s%>.

So all the <S%H5971>people<s%> that <S%H3458>Ishmael<s%> had carried away <S%H7617>captive<s%> from <S%H4709>Mizpah<s%> cast <S%H5437>about<s%> and <S%H7725>returned<s%>, and <S%H3212>went<s%> unto <S%H3110>Johanan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7143>Kareah<s%>.

But <S%H3458>Ishmael<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5418>Nethaniah<s%> <S%H4422>escaped<s%> <S%H6440>from<s%> <S%H3110>Johanan<s%> with <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H582>men<s%>, and <S%H3212>went<s%> to the <S%H1121%H5983>Ammonites<s%>.

Then <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H3110>Johanan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7143>Kareah<s%>, and all the <S%H8269>captains<s%> of the <S%H2428>forces<s%> that were with him, all the <S%H7611>remnant<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> whom he had <S%H7725>recovered<s%> from <S%H3458>Ishmael<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5418>Nethaniah<s%>, from <S%H4709>Mizpah<s%>, <S%H310>after<s%> that he had <S%H5221>slain<s%> <S%H1436>Gedaliah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H296>Ahikam<s%>, even <S%H1397>mighty<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H4421>war<s%>, and the <S%H802>women<s%>, and the <S%H2945>children<s%>, and the <S%H5631>eunuchs<s%>, whom he had brought <S%H7725>again<s%> from <S%H1391>Gibeon<s%>:

And they <S%H3212>departed<s%>, and dwelt <S%H3427>in<s%> the <S%H1628>habitation<s%> of <S%H3643>Chimham<s%>, which is <S%H681>by<s%> <S%H1035>Beth-lehem<s%>, to <S%H3212>go<s%> to <S%H935>enter<s%> into <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>,

<S%H6440>Because<s%> of the <S%H3778>Chaldeans<s%>: for they were <S%H3372>afraid<s%> of them, because <S%H3458>Ishmael<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5418>Nethaniah<s%> had <S%H5221>slain<s%> <S%H1436>Gedaliah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H296>Ahikam<s%>, whom the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> made <S%H6485>governor<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%>.
